data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Fukuoka, Japan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fukuoka, Japan

data.prayer: Father, help the 28,811 believers in Fukuoka to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Fukuoka with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Fukuoka, Japan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Mongol, Khalka people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Fukuoka, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Fukuoka, Japan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the state of Fukuoka, Japan has a population of 5,088,500.

We estimate Fukuoka has 28,811 people who might know Jesus, 81,245 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,978,445 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Fukuoka to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
